ovdesc.p: This file will be used to specify at customer level the margin rate used when calculating the margin value of assets/liabilities on the SC.POS.ASSET file. The values specified here is the first level of checking for calculation of margin value for the various assets/liabilities held by the portfolio. If margin is specified for a specified security, sub asset type, asset type or for all securities (by specifying ALL in ASSET.CODE), this would be used in the order mentioned above for computation of margin. Depending upon whether a valuation should include/exclude liabilities, either the field LOSS.MARGIN.RATE or MARGIN.RATE will be used to calculate the margin value. The method of calculation is defined in the field MARGIN.VALUE in SC.PARAMETER

for all other security types. The fields ASSET.CODE through to LOSS.MARGIN.RATE will form a multi-value set. Duplication of any of the values in the ASSET.CODE field will not be allowed.
